name: Michael Broder
what_you_do: Dr. Michael Broder is a psychologist, bestselling author, speaker, trainer and coach to high achievers, whose work centers around helping people to operate at their highest potential — with whatever parts of their lives they wish to optimize — in the shortest time possible.
social_proof: Dr. Broder was named by his peers as one of the top and most universally respected psychotherapists for adults and couples in a survey conducted by Philadelphia Magazine.
signature_programs: Seven Steps to Your Best Life: The Stage Climbing Solution For Living The Life You Were Born To Live, Positive Attitude Training, Self-Actualization: Achieving Your Full Potential, The Therapists Assistant Volumes I and II, Help Yourself Audiotherapy Series
business_focus: Helping high achievers operate at their highest potential through psychotherapy, coaching, and self-help resources.
